title: 3 Wins Silver IV
body:
Few days ago I got 3 Wins 7 Loss in **Ranked Solo/Duo** but then I got **Silver 4**?? I don't know why but i'm sure I didn't do very well in my placements nor my score was any good. I did play all support {{champion:16}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:26}} in my placements though (cause i'm pretty bad to be honest) but even then it feels weird to get a rating i feel like I didn't exactly deserve.

I did the exact same thing on **Ranked Flex** surprisingly got **3 wins 7 loss** as well I don't know how but it was weird and this time I got **Bronze I**{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} 

If anybody can tell me how and why this happens that would be great cause I am new to ranked cause what i heard is if your score is good even if you lose you get placed higher than if it was winning helps.

Ye my G bro Chur Bye.
